ValidationRule.description: If a New Proprietary Group is to be created, the New Prop Group Name must be provided before the Opp can be moved to Closed/Won.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', RecordType.Name = 'Proprietary', ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won'), ISBLANK( New_Proprietary_Group_Name__c ), NOT(ISBLANK(New_Proprietary_Group__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When a New Proprietary Group is specified, the New Proprietary Group Name must be provided before the opportunity can be moved to Closed Won
